message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has the potential to bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you've highlighted, I'm looking to invest a bit less at this time. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product has immense value to offer. Considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900000. This is a compromise that I believe will benefit both of us.
